reviewText: To the posters who complain that it does not play here in the USA... It is Region Free, BUT it is in PAL format and not NTSC. PAL is European at uses 50hrz instead of 60hrz broadcast frequency. SOme US players will play PAL discs without issue. Both of my Phillips Blu-rays work fine as well as my two PCs.

I was really excited that they had this match in blue-ray because i love this match! but when i tried to insert it into my Playstation 3, it did not work! then i tried inserting it into another blueray player and it did not work either!!! waste of money!
